course_name: Ten Canoes: Exploring Indigenous Art, Film, Music and Literature Through Iconi
description: This course provides students with the opportunity to learn about Indigenous Australian peoples and their art, film, literature and music making. Across the semester students will examine ten iconic works of Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander cultural production to explore Indigenous history and understand how Indigenous Australians use diverse forms of cultural expression to tell their history, resist and challenge colonial stereotypes and create new and exciting works of art.
